column4: hi, im trying to install ubuntu on an old dell (dell dimension 2350) and it keeps hanging on the bootup screen, about 20% of the bootup bar complete. its ubuntu 9.04, ran an md5 check and everythings fine. im baffled
restart and in the install menu press f4 and chose safe graphic mode or something to that effect then try again
i just did that, still hangs. :/
try sudo adduser "username" video then see if you can play it
